Literature.Title: Mudskipper (Boleophthalmus pectinirostris) Hepcidin-1 and Hepcidin-2 Present Different Gene Expression Profile and Antibacterial Activity and Possess Distinct Protective Effect against Edwardsiella tarda Infection.
Literature.Author: Chen J, Nie L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Vibrio vulnificus ATCC 279562(MIC=50µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus ATCC 17749(MIC=25µg/ml),Vibrio parahaemolyticus ATCC 33847(MIC=100µg/ml),Vibrio harveyi ATCC 33866(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum ATCC 19264(MIC=3.75µg/ml),Edwardsiella tarda Et-CD(MIC=25µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=25µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila ATCC 7966(no activity data),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Streptococcus iniae ATCC 29178(MIC=25µg/ml)
